azurerm_cosmosdb_table.description: Manages a Table within a Cosmos DB Account.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Cosmos DB Table. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Cosmos DB Table is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

account_name.description: The name of the Cosmos DB Table to create the table within. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

throughput.description: The throughput of Table (RU/s). Must be set in increments of `100`. The minimum value is `400`. This must be set upon database creation otherwise it cannot be updated without a manual terraform destroy-apply.

id.description: The ID of the CosmosDB Table.

create.description: Used when creating the CosmosDB Table.

update.description: Used when updating the CosmosDB Table.

read.description: Used when retrieving the CosmosDB Table.

delete.description: Used when deleting the CosmosDB Table.
